plot: Public Security Bureau investigator Dong Fangjian is recalled from his honeymoon to track down a spy who has information on secret tests of a prototype submarine.
title: Dongfang Jian
plot_es: Public Security Bureau investigator Dong Fangjian is recalled from his honeymoon to track down a spy who has information on secret tests of a prototype submarine.
plot_en: Public Security Bureau investigator Dong Fangjian is recalled from his honeymoon to track down a spy who has information on secret tests of a prototype submarine.
